title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Pearl River, Guangzhou
content:
Posted on September 10, 2021 by Kristi Benedict

Support us! BikeRumor may earn a small commission from affiliate links in this article. Learn more.

Photo submitted by Michael Huang, “I am from Guangzhou City China, I enjoyed riding along the mother river of the city, Pearl River, on my own brand ‘CAFFEINE’ handmade steel/carbon bike.”

We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.
author: Kristi Benedict
